books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of decadence and excess...

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel...

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A story of racial injustice...

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A epic science fiction saga set in a distant future where noble families battle for control of the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the universe's most valuable substance, the spice melange.

books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.description: A gripping mystery about a journalist and a hacker who team up to solve a decades-old disappearance in a wealthy family.

books.title: The Notebook
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A heartwarming love story about a young couple who fall in love in the 1940s, and how their love endures through the challenges of life.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States, Michelle Obama.

books.title: The Name of the Wind
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: The first book in the Kingkiller Chronicle series, following the story of Kvothe, a legendary wizard and adventurer.

books.title: The Shining
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A terrifying story of a family's winter at an isolated hotel, where the father's descent into madness threatens their lives.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A fast-paced thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he uncovers a conspiracy tied to Leonardo da Vinci's works.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in a deadly televised competition.

books.title: Charlotte's Web
books.author: E.B. White
books.description: A heartwarming tale of friendship between a pig named Wilbur and a spider named Charlotte.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy adventure about Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who embarks on a quest to reclaim a treasure guarded by a dragon.

books.title: A Brief History of Time
books.author: Stephen Hawking
books.description: A groundbreaking exploration of the universe, from the Big Bang to black holes, written for a general audience.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A groundbreaking exploration of the universe, from the Big Bang to black holes, written for a general audience.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A provocative exploration of how Homo sapiens became Earth's dominant species, examining key revolutions in human history.

books.title: Watchmen
books.author: Alan Moore
books.description: A groundbreaking graphic novel that deconstructs the concept of superheroes in an alternate history where costumed vigilantes are part of everyday life.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking, and the criminal psychotherapist determined to get her to talk.

books.title: The Kite Runner
books.author: Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A powerful story of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set against the backdrop of Afghanistan's turbulent history.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this science fiction adventure from the author of The Martian.

books.title: The Lies of Locke Lamora
books.author: Scott Lynch
books.description: The first book in the Gentleman Bastard series follows a band of clever con artists in a fantastical Venetian-inspired city.

books.title: The Thursday Murder Club
books.author: Richard Osman
books.description: Four septuagenarians in a retirement home meet weekly to solve cold cases, but find themselves investigating a real murder.

books.title: Normal People
books.author: Sally Rooney
books.description: A complex love story between two teenagers from different backgrounds who weave in and out of each other's lives.

books.title: Born a Crime
books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: The Daily Show host's remarkable story of growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa with a fearless mother who broke all the rules.

books.title: Mexican Gothic
books.author: Silvia Moreno-Garcia
books.description: A chilling horror novel about a socialite investigating her cousin's claims that her new husband is trying to murder her in a mysterious mansion.
